title: Elon Musk Says He Will Reinstate Suspended Twitter Accounts
description: Twitter’s leader says amnesty begins next week for those previously banned for violating policies.

title: Apple Addresses Worker Complaints After Unrest at China iPhone Factory
description: Apple says it has staff at the Zhengzhou site where clashes broke out between factory workers and police, amid a staff shortage and a Covid outbreak at the iPhone manufacturing compound.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Plans to Save the World Went Down in Flames
description: The FTX founder pledged to donate billions. His firm’s swift collapse wiped out his wealth and ambitious philanthropic endeavors.

title: Twitter Exodus Hits Teams Tasked With Regulatory Issues
description: Elon Musk’s effort to purge Twitter employees who don’t embrace his vision has led to a wave of departures among policy and safety-issue staffers around the globe.
